parsePagesAndToCsv() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Retrieves actual product data from pages and outputs data of each product variation in a separated CSV file.
parsePagesAndToDb() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Retrieves actual product data from pages and stores them in the DB.
printAllCollectedDbData() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Prints out all collected data for all products from the DB.
printChangedDbData() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Prints out from the DB collected product data that has changed any time in the past.
printCurrentData() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Prints currently used configuration (products, their sizes to search for, their parameters to retrieve and common parameters of products).
printNamedAlikeProductsDbData(String) - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Prints out all collected data for all products from the DB that contain given word(s) in their name.
printParticularProductDbData(String) - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Prints out all collected data for a product (by its unique SKU ID) from the DB.
printRecentlyChangedDbData() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Prints out from the DB collected product data that has just changed, i.e.
ProductDataGrabber - Class in sv.grabber.productdatacrc1
The Product Data Grabber retrieves actual data (size, price, discount, availability, color, etc) for a particular set of product variations from CRC product pages, shows the results and stores them to different targets, like SQLite database, csv files.
ProductDataGrabber() - Constructor for class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Reads initial configuration (products, their sizes to search for, their parameters to retrieve and common parameters of products) from binary files [data/crc_*.dat], and if no DAT files - from text files [data/crc_*.cfg] and creates needed tables in the DB if do not exist yet.
ProductDataGrabber.SizeType - Enum in sv.grabber.productdatacrc1
 
ProductDataset - Class in sv.grabber.productdatacrc1
Implementation of product data set to store product search configuration.
putConfigurationToCfgFiles() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Writes currently used configuration data (products, their sizes to search for, their parameters to retrieve and common parameters of products) to CFG files [data/crc_*.cfg].
putConfigurationToDatFiles() - Method in class sv.grabber.productdatacrc1.ProductDataGrabber
Writes currently used configuration data (products, their sizes to search for, their parameters to retrieve and common parameters of products) to DAT files [data/crc_*.dat].
